title: Continuous_learning_log log
description: Each entry records a continuous learning activity.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when activity started.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when activity started.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when activity completed.

end_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when activity completed.

person_id.description: the person who carried out the learning.

was successful.description: indicates whether the learning activity was successful
